example.name: All arguments...Oh Bella!
example.text: She was gone then, her call goodbye to Billy echoed in Jacob's ears.

roles.note: Based on verb roleset call.03. VN class 0rder-60.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: European Union foreign policy chief Catherine Ashton has renewed her call for Yemen's president to give up power.
example.arg: for Yemen's president to give up power.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His call to the people for action was inspiring.

roleset.name: prediction, decision

example.name: All arguments, light verb construction
example.text: Joe Bastardi makes his call on the '09 hurricane season.
example.note: Remember that second mentions of agent (here "his" after "Joe Bastardi") are not annotated, only subject of light verb.

example.name: judgement call
example.text: Since we have to use a survey -LRB- it 's just not possible to do a full count every month -RRB- , any subjectivity will increase our error , so we have to avoid any possible overlaps or judgement calls .

example.name: Light verb with arg2
example.text: Although I'm not a huge fan of that functionality (yeah, I like guns that can shoot as far as I can see), the developers made the call that a bullet wouldn't be able to reach fom one side of the screen to the other.
example.arg: Although I'm not a huge fan of that functionality
that a bullet wouldn't be able to reach from one side of the screen to the other

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb call.10. No appropriate VN class. Expanded by Julia. Includes a little bit of conceptual overlap with call-v.11.

roleset.name: summon, perhaps to or by phone

example.name: phone call
example.text: Her call to the pentagon was dropped when she went through a tunnel.

example.name: LV
example.text: Well , and then what happened was , we had a conference call.

example.name: all args, LVC
example.text: While I was covering for one of the other pediatricians, I made a house call on a child with a draining ear.
example.arg: While I was covering for one of the other pediatricians
on a child with a draining ear
